title: Sem 6 electives
content:
Will taking NLP and Deep learning together be a good choice 
Will it be too much workload 
Whats the difficulty level like

comments.body:
Which one NLP or Deep learning
also whats the research paper thing in deep learning

Both are hard.

TDL wants you to do a course project that Shylaja maam tries to convert into a publication (at least that's was  how it was for us)
